about_the_game:
The principles of the universe are its bones, time flows silently through its veins, and the cosmic web forms its nerves…

"All things will fade—that may be the rule for many worlds, but not for mine."

"Even you must sometimes hope for a twist in the world, don't you?"

 

You are an ordinary girl from a rural area, with a humble background.

For the sixteen years since your birth, the seasons have cycled, the sun has risen and set, and the universe has moved faithfully to the rhythm you know so well.

Immersed in the bittersweet routine of daily life, you believe that this is all there is to existence.

However, upon entering high school, the arrival of two mysterious boys disrupts your once ordinary life.

It seems a supernatural force is shaking the familiar world you thought you understood.

As reality and dreams start to intertwine, you begin to question your preconceptions about the world.

Is this story one of miracles, mysteries, or distortions?

All the answers rest in your choices…

Protagonist

A cute girl with a sunflower hairpin, who has worked hard to make it from a small-town middle school to a prestigious high school.
Kind-hearted, sincere, and sensitive, she displays surprising courage in critical moments. Like most, she has an ordinary understanding of the world.
However, since starting high school, she seems to be crossing paths with people touched by the supernatural.

Tian Tian

One of the romanceable characters. A god of the cosmos, an extraordinary being who controls the laws of nature.
As a transfer student, he becomes the protagonist’s deskmate.
Endowed with limitless power, he can freely manipulate time, life, and death, and reshape the world at will.

Outwardly, he appears as a mischievous high schooler, but deep down, he holds a profound indifference toward all things. He faces everything with humor and a carefree attitude, making him hard to decipher.

Lu Zhe

Another romanceable character. Handsome and charismatic, he is the quintessential campus heartthrob from a powerful and wealthy family, capturing the attention of all.
While he presents himself flawlessly, there is a hidden side to his character, revealing depth and complexity.

He is always seen with a violin, and his unique musical talent seems strangely intertwined with an alien civilization…

Zhang Zecheng

A key figure in the main storyline. A new teacher at the school, he is an internationally renowned physicist and a leading figure in cosmology, celebrated as a future science pioneer. The reason for his teaching at the high school remains a mystery.

Polite and refined, his lectures are rich in knowledge and unique insights. Occasionally, he surprises his students by presenting views that seem a bit unfit for a high school classroom.

 

As the player, you will take on the role of a high school girl, guiding the story through text choices and experiencing different romance paths and story developments.

 

  • Text-based AVG game

  • A plot filled with hints and complex character personalities

  • Rich art resources

  • Includes seven or more possible endings

  • QQ Group: 628699031

  • Weibo: @日冕鹰

  • Publisher: Cosmic Train

short_description: This is an AVG visual novel with romance elements, set against the backdrop of a Chinese high school. It tells a story about imagination, the universe, and the youthful innocence of high school students.
